Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.move

Class MyMove

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.move.MyMove
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConstructionManagerTest.MyCard.MyTestMove, MovementManagerTest.MyCard.MyTestMove
public class MyMove
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing a Player's Movement and providing all the operations it needs to evaluate a Movement move correctness.
Author:
AndreaAltomare

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  MyMove.WorkerMoved
    This class let to create objects which encapsulate the information about a movement forced upon an opponent's Worker.

    • MyMove

      public MyMove​(Card parentCard, GodPower godPower, java.util.List<MoveChecker> checkers, MoveExecutor executor)

      Parameters:
      parentCard - Associated Card
      godPower - Associated God's power
      checkers - Checkers for moves
      executor - Executor for moves

  • Method Details

    • executeMove

      public boolean executeMove​(Move move, Worker worker) throws OutOfBoardException, WinException
      This method check for the correctness of the move provided, then actually executes it.
      Parameters:
      move - (Move to execute)
      worker - (Worker who has executed the move)
      Returns:
      (Move was successfully executed ? true : false)
      Throws:
      OutOfBoardException - (Exception handled by Controller)
      WinException - (Exception handled by Controller)

    • checkMove

      public boolean checkMove​(Move move, Worker worker)
      This method check for the correctness of the move provided.
      Parameters:
      move - (Move to check)
      worker - (Worker who has executed the move)
      Returns:
      (Move is allowed ? true : false)

    • calculateNextCell

      public static Cell calculateNextCell​(Move move) throws OutOfBoardException
      Given a Move performed by a worker, this method calculate the next Cell on the same Cardinal direction on which the Move occurs.
      Parameters:
      move - (Move on which perform the calculation)
      Returns:
      Next Cell on the same Cardinal direction on which Move occurs. (Calculated)
      Throws:
      OutOfBoardException - (Exception handled by Controller)

    • checkNextCell

      public static boolean checkNextCell​(Cell nextOpponentCell)
      Method used when playing with Minotaur Card. Tells if the (calculated) next Cell in which the Opponent's Worker would be forced into is allowed.
      Parameters:
      nextOpponentCell - (Cell to check)
      Returns:
      (Cell is free and allowed to make the Opponent's Worker to move into ? true : false)

    • isSameCell

      public static boolean isSameCell​(Cell a, Cell b)
      Given two Cells, tells if they are the same (same position on the Board).
      Parameters:
      a - (First provided Cell)
      b - (Second provided Cell)
      Returns:
      (Cell a and Cell b are equal ? true : false)

    • beyondAdjacentCells

      public static boolean beyondAdjacentCells​(Cell a, Cell b)
      Given two Cells, tells if they are adjacent.
      Parameters:
      a - (First provided Cell)
      b - (Second provided Cell)
      Returns:
      (Cell a and Cell b are adjacent ? true : false)

    • tooHighCell

      public static boolean tooHighCell​(Cell a, Cell b)
      Given two Cells, tells if the first one is more than one Level higher than the second one.
      Parameters:
      a - (First provided Cell)
      b - (Second provided Cell)
      Returns:
      (Cell a is more than one Level higher than Cell b ? true : false)
